p: Plants were harvested at the end of each growing period. In the first harvest, shoot biomass was clipped 2 cm above soil surface and in the second period, shoot biomass was harvested at soil surface. Shoot biomass was sorted by species. Sand was removed and roots were washed out of soil. Fresh roots biomass was weighed and fresh shoot and root plant mass were dried at 70°C for 3 days and weighed.
